key_points.label: A
key_points.note: Point on the graph at x = -1

reasoning: The chart region was selected because the problem involves analyzing the behavior of a function as x approaches -1, which is typically represented in a graph.
The x-axis and y-axis labels and ticks were extracted to understand the scale and behavior of the function.
A key point on the graph at x = -1 was identified to assist in determining the limit.
